level.heading: Minimum fee for transfer of a license to new owner.
level.text: The minimum fee for transfer of a license to a new owner shall be $150.

level.heading: HISTORICAL AND STATUTORY NOTES
level.text: D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code. The text of this section is derived from provisions formerly found in D.C. Code § 25-117. For notes from former § 25-117, see § 25-316.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following § 25-101.
